description: Update an existing work order assignment.
permissions: Allowed if the user has delegated update permission on the related work order, or if the assignment user is the current user and the user is a technician in the brokers business unit and the work orders responsible party business unit.
side_effects: Updates relationships on a work order assignment.
validation_notes: Requires assignment ID argument and at least one of --work-order or --user. Work order and user must exist if IDs are provided. User ID must be unique per work order ID.
